title: Arcane spirit shield

properties.name: description
properties.value: The arcane spirit shield is a shield which requires 75 Defence, 65 Magic, and 70 Prayer to wield. The shield is made by attaching an arcane sigil, a rare drop from the Corporeal Beast, to a blessed spirit shield. This process requires 90 Prayer and 85 Smithing. Players without the required skill levels to create the shield may ask Abbot Langley in the Edgeville Monastery to combine the sigil and the blessed spirit shield, for a fee of 1,500,000 coins.

Item ID12825

The arcane spirit shield is a shield which requires 75 Defence, 65 Magic, and 70 Prayer to wield. The shield is made by attaching an arcane sigil, a rare drop from the Corporeal Beast, to a blessed spirit shield. This process requires 90 Prayer and 85 Smithing. Players without the required skill levels to create the shield may ask Abbot Langley in the Edgeville Monastery to combine the sigil and the blessed spirit shield, for a fee of 1,500,000 coins.

This shield's defensive bonuses are identical to the blessed spirit shield, but it provides a magic attack bonus of +20. The arcane spirit shield's counterpart, the spectral spirit shield, instead provides a magic defence bonus of +30.

Removing the arcane sigil[edit | edit source]

In a future update with the addition of the third raid, the arcane sigil will be able to be extracted from the arcane spirit shield by bringing it to Abbot Langley. This process destroys the blessed spirit shield and only returns the arcane sigil.[1]

Comparison[edit | edit source]

The shield has the same defensive bonuses as the blessed spirit shield, though it also gives a +20 Magic attack bonus. This makes it the best off-hand Magic attack item in the game, outclassing the mage's book and the ancient wyvern shield (+15). The ancient wyvern shield offers more defence against stab, slash and magic attacks when fully charged, but penalises ranged defence, unlike the arcane spirit shield.

Like the other spirit shields, it also gives a small Prayer bonus and has no offensive penalties, making it suitable for all styles of combat. Its substantial Magic attack bonus, however, makes it most suited for mages.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 June 2018
(update)

The arcane spirit shield, along with the others, was made slightly clearer in-game. Female characters also now have their own unique model, reducing the distance between the shields and their bodies.

[[File:Arcane spirit shield detail.png|120px|left]]

The '''arcane spirit shield''' is a shield which requires 75 [[Defence]], 65 [[Magic]], and 70 [[Prayer]] to wield. The shield is made by attaching an [[arcane sigil]], a rare drop from the [[Corporeal Beast]], to a [[blessed spirit shield]]. This process requires 90 [[Prayer]] and 85 [[Smithing]]. Players without the required skill levels to create the shield may ask [[Abbot Langley]] in the [[Edgeville Monastery]] to combine the sigil and the blessed spirit shield, for a fee of 1,500,000 coins.

This shield's defensive bonuses are identical to the [[blessed spirit shield]], but it provides a magic attack bonus of +20. The arcane spirit shield's counterpart, the [[spectral spirit shield]], instead provides a magic defence bonus of +30.

==Removing the arcane sigil==
In a future update with the addition of the third raid, the [[arcane sigil]] will be able to be extracted from the [[arcane spirit shield]] by bringing it to [[Abbot Langley]]. This process destroys the [[blessed spirit shield]] and only returns the arcane sigil.{{CiteVideo|author=OldSchoolRS|title=The Launch of Combat Achievements|url=https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1104047132?t=1h54m44s|timestamp=1:54:44|date=31 July 2021|site=Twitch.tv|notes= ''"Introduced a feature on Abbot Langley to revert that process, destroys the blessed spirit shield, but you'll get the sigil back so you can attach it to the Ward of Elidinis."''|name=OldSchoolRS Summer Summit 2021}}

==Comparison==
The shield has the same defensive bonuses as the blessed spirit shield, though it also gives a +20 Magic attack bonus. This makes it the best off-hand Magic attack item in the game, outclassing the [[mage's book]] and the [[ancient wyvern shield]] (+15). The ancient wyvern shield offers more defence against stab, slash and magic attacks when fully charged, but penalises ranged defence, unlike the arcane spirit shield.

Like the other spirit shields, it also gives a small Prayer bonus and has no offensive penalties, making it suitable for all styles of combat. Its substantial Magic attack bonus, however, makes it most suited for mages.
